name: Bubble wrap (itch) (cheeaun)
description:
Bubble wrap A rather satisfying bubble wrap popping game.

👉👉👉 Also playable on https://bubble-wrap.party/  🎉🎉🎉

How to play?

👆 Tap on the bubbles to pop them!

🍾 After a period of time, the bubbles will "unpop" and you'll have to pop them again!

📈 Pop all of them to level up!

⚡️ As you level up, the bubbles will "unpop" faster!

⌨️ You can use your keyboard to pop them too! Simply type any random keys on your keyboard!

Development

GitHub: https://github.com/cheeaun/bubble-wrap
